Object Type
```{r}

```
Save an object .
```{r}
#clone
iristeste = iris
#save
save(iristeste, file="iristeste.Rdata")
#removing from R
rm(iristeste)
#testing the removal
iristeste
```
Load 
```{r}
#load the object of the disk
load(file="iristeste.Rdata")
#test
iristeste
```
